ns2:test-suite.name: As a Amazon user I should be able to login and logout with valid credentials

test-case.name: Login into the application with valid credentials
test-case.title: Login into the application with valid credentials

step.name: Given I am on the Login page URL "https://www.amazon.in/"
step.title: Given I am on the Login page URL "https://www.amazon.in/"

step.name: Then I click on sign in button and wait for sign in page
step.title: Then I click on sign in button and wait for sign in page

step.name: Then I should see Sign In Page
step.title: Then I should see Sign In Page

step.name: When I enter username as "9886076735"
step.title: When I enter username as "9886076735"

step.name: And I Click on Continue button
step.title: And I Click on Continue button

step.name: And I enter password as "Ravi1234@1"
step.title: And I enter password as "Ravi1234@1"

step.name: And click on login button
step.title: And click on login button

step.name: Then I am logged in
step.title: Then I am logged in

step.name: And I clear cart items if any
step.title: And I clear cart items if any

step.name: Then I choose Electronincs>Headphones and headphones list out
step.title: Then I choose Electronincs>Headphones and headphones list out

step.name: Then I add first availabe headphone to cart
step.title: Then I add first availabe headphone to cart

step.name: Then I search "Macbook pro" and add second available item to cart
step.title: Then I search "Macbook pro" and add second available item to cart

step.name: Then I Select cart from home and remove the earlier added headphones
step.title: Then I Select cart from home and remove the earlier added headphones

step.name: Then I Reduce the Quantity of the macbook pro product to one and proceed to checkout
step.title: Then I Reduce the Quantity of the macbook pro product to one and proceed to checkout

step.name: And I Click on Sign out
step.title: And I Click on Sign out

step.name: Then I got log out from the application and land on sign in page
step.title: Then I got log out from the application and land on sign in page

label.name: story
label.value: Login into the application with valid credentials

label.name: feature
label.value: As a Amazon user I should be able to login and logout with valid credentials
